definition: The word "hervor" refers to the action of bringing something into view or making something noticeable. It is commonly used to describe the act of emphasizing or highlighting a particular aspect or quality of something.

examples.german: Sie hob ihre Hand hervor, um eine Frage zu stellen.
examples.english: She raised her hand to ask a question.

examples.german: Der Künstler hob die Schönheit der Landschaft hervor.
examples.english: The artist highlighted the beauty of the landscape.

examples.german: Das Buch hebt die Bedeutung der Freundschaft hervor.
examples.english: The book emphasizes the importance of friendship.

examples.german: Der Redner hob die Probleme der Arbeiterklasse hervor.
examples.english: The speaker highlighted the issues of the working class.
